title: Save $800 on your dream Mac Studio desktop setup right now
content:
Macworld

The perfect Apple combo for creatives just so happens to be on sale. At the same time, the Mac Studio with an M2 Max is $500 off at B&H, and the Studio Display is discounted by $300 over at Amazon.

The M2 Max Apple Mac Studio desktop isn’t the latest model (which has an M4 Max), but it’s still a fantastic machine that has enough power for even the most demanding jobs. “The Mac Studio is the ideal Mac—it’s powerful, priced appropriately, has lots of ports for connecting devices, and it won’t take up a lot of desk space,” reads our review of the device.

On top of the super-fast M2 Max chip, the device features 32GB of memory and a 512GB SSD. There are also plenty of ports available to hook up your devices, including one of Apple’s gorgeous Studio Displays.

The 5K Studio Display is a stunning $1,300 at Amazon, within a few dollars of its very best price. When we reviewed the Studio Display, we mentioned how much we loved the monitor’s incredible design and exemplary image quality. Not only does this 27-inch monitor deliver 5K visuals, but it also comes with an impressive Spatial Audio sound system and an ultrawide camera with Center Stage, as well as some extra USB-C ports.

So there you have it: the perfect combo for creative professionals! Get the Mac Studio M2 Max for $1,499 at B&H and the Apple Studio Display for $1,300 at Amazon while the deals still stand.
